title: Veggie Garden - Dels Angels
typeOfFood: Vegan, Indian, Organic, Juice bar, Asian, Fusion, Spanish, Nepalese
description: Opened Nov 2011, this spacious vegan restaurant on 2 floors uses organic ingredients to create the meals which are based mainly on Indian and Nepalese. Has fresh juices. Sit out on the terrace or inside the painted two-story restaurant. Near Cataluyna square and Museum of Contemporary Arts Barcelona.
